fields.value: - Each night, you can Observe at a playerâ€™s house. You learn their role, everyone who visits them, and what actions happen to them (like Spy).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have a Theory which contains every player's name. You can add roles next to player's names.
- At the end of each night, if every player has the correct role next to their name, you leave the town in victory.
- You see past Frames.
- If the town hangs you, they all gain the ability to see past frames and can hang an additional player the next day.
- If an evil faction kills you, they appear Innocent from now on and get an additional factional anonymous vote (the town knows the evils get this vote).
- __**Part of the Daily Streak faction.**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Correctly guess each player's role in your Theory.
